title: The JDuo at Langhorne Brewing Company
description: Come enjoy music from The JDuo while sipping on craft beers at Langhorne Brewing Company.

title: Solo at The Boathouse
description: An intimate solo performance at the scenic Boathouse in Lambertville.

title: The JDuo at Chambers
description: Enjoy an evening of music from The JDuo at Chambers in downtown Doylestown.

title: The JDuo at Triumph Brewing
description: Spend your Sunday afternoon with great music and craft beer at Triumph Brewing.

title: Solo at Evansburg Vineyards
description: A relaxing afternoon of music among the vines at Evansburg Vineyards

title: Full band at Shady Brook Main Stage
description: Catch Jake Dillon with a full band on The Shady Brook Main Stage playing all of your favorite covers and originals
